basics.name: Bernardo Estrada
basics.label: Tec de Monterrey Student and Full-stack developer
basics.summary: I am a young student studying Computer Systems Engineering at Tecnológico de Monterrey Campus Querétaro, scheduled to graduate in May 2023. I have experience in robotics and programming workshops, social service at the Ecology Institute of CONACYT, an exchange in Moncton, Canada, CCNA1 and CCNA2 certifications issued by CISCO, and work experience at nibbio, GE Aviation, Leadsales and Microsoft. My skills include React, Node.js, NestJS, Full-Stack Development, TypeScript and React Hooks.

work.name: Leadsales
work.summary:
I played a significant role in full-stack development, proficiently handling both front-end and back-end tasks. I followed the Domain-Driven Design (DDD) architecture and adhered to the Capability Maturity Model Integration (CMMI) practices, ensuring efficient project management. Additionally, I embraced agile planning methodologies to enhance productivity and deliver high-quality results.

In the back-end development phase, I primarily focused on microservices within a monorepo environment, leveraging the power of NestJs and NX frameworks. I skillfully utilized a range of cutting-edge technologies such as gRPC, WebSockets, and CQRS to develop robust and scalable solutions.

work.name: Microsoft
work.summary: Specialized in frontend development using React.

volunteer.position: Asistente en laboratorio de introducción a la ciencia
volunteer.summary:
Helped organize lab sessions, inventoried lab materials and provided IT support for lab computers and equipment

Ayudé a organizar las sesiones de laboratorio, inventarié los materiales del laboratorio y brindé soporte técnico para las computadoras y el equipo del laboratorio

Create a custom web app for non-profit dog shelter to assist with adoption and advertising.
Technologies: PHP, Apache, JS, AJAX, and UiKit.

Crear una aplicación web personalizada para refugio de perros sin fines de lucro para ayudar con adopciones y publicidad.
Tecnologías: PHP, Apache, JS, AJAX y UiKit.

Create a web app for non-profit geriatric center to assist with advertising, donations and community outreach using NodeJS, Vue, Jest, GitHub actions and TypeScript.

Crear una aplicación web para centro geriátrico sin fines de lucro para ayudar con publicidad, donaciones y alcance a la comunidad utilizando NodeJS, Vue, Jest, GitHub actions y TypeScript.
